values:
Every year on 9/11 i always post about that time...it sucked...but this year its a little different because I am finally watching it in sequence again....CNN is showing their coverage in sequence from the time it started and its really really eerie......SO....Where as I on 9/11?


I was in first period honors choir that morning, I remember leaving for school that morning, Smells like teen spirit was the last video i saw on tv before i left...I had washed my car the evening before...so it was very clean..i remember that I wore a white Hilfiger dress shirt and khakis....We didnt know what happened until second period and i remember that megan gregory was walking with me in the hall and was talking about some stupid shit with some dude of hers and i really didnt care, walked into Mrs Wood's geometry in the "old new building" and i walked in and we watched the second plane hit as it happened....the rest of the day was spent in an attempt to hide that we were all watching it on tv because by 4th period the school leadership said we couldnt.....In 6th period we actually had someone on watch near the door to make sure no one made us turn it off......

When I left i went with my sister to clarksville to have dinner....They were selling Extra editions of hte newspaper in the medians of the street, i still have mine....rough day.....the days to follow were cnn on every single channel...because of this, the Keanu Reeves movie that came out that weekend was a number one hit because it was something that was not terrorist related. The months to come actually made me a republican for like 15 minutes.......and the terrorists won.......However that faded, and i think the gargantuan sense of patriotism has faded somewhat as well. The country hates our current leader and the world hates the united states more than ever...so....has anything really changed?????



C

in my hunanities course ..this is hell..i mean really..the guy is nice....but he is boring as hell.....if i had to compare himto anyone that you guys could recognize...i would have to make it Mr. Chester from French class in high school....and he foams at the mouth..so thats sort of awkward....

Tried talking to gil online the other night...but she didnt want to talk to me...it hurt.....


talking to my friend asa on IM...thats nice.....if i didnt have a computer..i might die.....

or commit a felony.........

OH...I TOTALLY FORGOT, my pal barbara, otherwise known as Sadie on Z97.5 is hosting a lot of the Riverfest stuff at the Riverwalk this year, and she is getting me backstage to meet...the one ..the only...NELSON...as in the 80s group best known for their hit " Love and affection"...its so awesomely 80s and i am happy...

DID YOU KNOW, THAT THE pERSIAN EMPIRE, CIRCA 500 B.C. BEGAN TO COLLAPSE UNDER ITS OWN GREAT SIZE AND INABLITY TO GOVERN ITSELF... but then stabalized...unfortunately.



well...im out..i guess i will go and.....yeah.........

i think i will start using livejournal again..why not....

Chris

So...I had my first strip club experience friday night....

The event was my pal Mike's birthday....he is leaving for Iraq tuesday and his birthday is 9/11 so he will be gone for it...wow...it must suck to have your birthday on 9/11......Anyways, about 15 of us went to the Mulligans pub in nashville for irish food and a table-banging good time....it was fine...followed by a few hours at Decades...Nashville Tennessee's best dance club rocking only the hits of the 80's and 90s......Afterwhich most of the party...all but 5 of us went back to the Sheraton. The rest of us went looking for trouble in Printers Alley.

Printers Alley, for those of you who might not know, its a bedlam, a Babylon of Nashville of sorts. Every vice you could possibly desire is located in this 200 foot long alleyway in downtown nashville. We walked in as we have many times however this time, I saw the sign of glory...Brass Stables Gentlemens club....and it was ....glorious..

So several hours later, i stumbled out a broken ....horny man.......

Next time i will take alot of single bills....


I got a new laptop..thats always fun.....


Well...ok....im out.....


C

Fill this out about your SENIOR year of high school! The longer ago it was, the more fun the answers will be.


1. Who was your best friend?: Hell if i know
2. What sports did you play?:hahahahahaha

3. What kind of car did you drive?: a 92 camaro...then the ill-fated death trap stanza

4. It's Friday night, where were you at?: at a friends house partying or at a rehearsal or some shit
5. Were you a party animal?: Sure

6. Were you a considered a flirt?: i dont know....was i??? *wink
7. Ever skip school?: AAAAAAhahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha~~~~~~~~~~! 

8. Ever smoke?: Yes

9. Were you a nerd?: no

10. Did you get suspended/expelled?:never

11. Can you sing the Alma Mater?:
   "On our cities southern border reared against the sky...proudly stands our alma mater as the years go by.... " and so on and so on....

12. Who was your favorite teacher? trier......and of course JIMMY STEPHENS

13. Favorite class?: HONOR choir and the period that i was an aide for Mrs. Gray 

14. What was your school's full name?:Montgomery Central High School. 

15. School mascot?:Indians

16. Did you go to Prom?: you bet it...and GODDAMN WAS THAT BITCH HOT!!!!! 

17. If you could go back and do it over, would you? ABSOLUTELY..IT WAS ROCK SHIT....

18. What do you remember most about graduation?: It was hot....... MS Uffelman got pssed at me cause I got ot of the line to go take a piss....and of course...our rendition of "Time of My Life"  
19. Favorite memory of your Senior Year?: WORST MEMORY???   Cat on a Hot Tin Roof BEST and the WORST would have to be the fact that it was the year of 9/11...that was just a shitty time to be alive you know...

20. Were you ever posted up on the senior wall?: What the fuck is a  senior wall?

21. Did you have a job your senior year?: nope

22. Who did you date?: your mom 

23. Where did you go most often for lunch?: sadly...we could only go to the lunch pod....

24. Have you gained weight since then?: Gained and lost but cocaine is a hell of a drug....

25. What did you do after graduation?: i left the Dunn Center???

26. When did you graduate? 2002

While  roaming around Myspace - the trendiest of websites this day in age.....I thought of my old friend...Livejournal...not flashy..not the most popular, or the best dresser, but a good friend none the less. So..I thought, hell, i have been updating for five years now, I might as well keep it going...so...here goes

I just finished my 6th semester of college...of course I am a junior....although it sucks a little cause people that I graduated high school with are graduating now...but i lost a whole year so fuck them all in the ass.....

I have a 3.875. hehehehehe

I still drive the cadillac...and it sucks ass....

I think Goodfellas is the greatest movie ever made. 

I have gotta start working out again...

I have a sinus infection...

I am reconsidering every career path i have planned out thus far.....

I still like reba mc entire

I still dont like Republicans......nothing personal...i just know your all going to hell....

I believe in a thing called love....

I love kareoke...

I relish in the fact that i can buy liqor and cigarrettes....even though I dont smoke, but well..i guess i do drink....just a little.

I love 2.00 well drink night at the Tap Room. 

I hate that adam and katie broke up and caused the whole social order of my clique to collapse...goddamn them both.

I have a sinus infection. 

I have a mean mother .....but she has a restaurant that makes alot of money and she pays for alot of my shit so.....i allow it...

I MISS BRITTANY AND GILLIE

I miss theatre...but i am working on that....

I think Ben Morrison is very inconsiderate when he is in your home....

I think Jeremy Maxwell is sneaky...and thats why he is cool...

I think that Jaime Farmer is hot

I love the show Greys Anatomy. 

I hate writing poetry....

I love writing short stories. 

I love taco bell...

So........this is all i have to say about that...I expect you all to give me many comments on this entry and read it all!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1

Very Truly Yours,
Chris A. Sutton - The Aristocrat.

OH MY GOD...CHRIS IS GOING TO UPDATE HIS ...WHATS THIS CALLED...LIVEJOURNAL..OH ...THATS THAT THING THAT NO ONE USES ANY MORE SINCE MYSPACE.COM IS WHERE ALL THE COOL KIDS ARE NOW....


Anyways,
What is new with me??? Not much..just chilling and going to school and sometimes work...Earl used to work with me..he quit today..i hate him now....

I have been going out far too much recently..But that is one of the grand things about this time of year, you cant hang out outside alot so you have to go do other indoor things to amuse yourself. What are some of the fn things that have been going on recently???

Ben Wilson had his CD release party...that was alot of fun....I got to get dressed up and hang with cool people and eat and drink and it was all good...nice atmostphere....

Lots of drinking...lots......

Christmas shopping....

My parents have bought a cabin in pigeon forge.....Thats right...party with chris in the mountains as soon as you can!!!

Predators games...been to a few.

I think im failing my online accounting class....

I hate my job. 

I like gillie and brittany...they are hot...but I know they will never read this entry so they are NOT hot..and i will not pay either of them one CENT of child support. 

Well, I am going to go watch a documentary down at the Trahern now about how Wal-Mart is the devil...then to 541 to get my Kareoke on...

Later Yall

I HAVENT UPDATED IN MONTHS....IM SO COOL...SO CHECK ME OUT ON A REGULAR BASIS AT 
MYSPACE.COM....... http://www.myspace.com/thegreatestamericanhero


bRITTANY...GILLIE......EVERYONE ELSE ON LIVEJOURNAL IS COOL!!!

BUT I AM COOLEST!!!!

REVEL IN MY GLORY!!!!

My musician friend Ben Wilson has a kick ass site at www.benwilsonmusic.com You should all go there and check it out. And also come out to the Deli on tuesdays to hear great songs he does like this one....my personal favorite. 

Triple X Kinda Love



Brandi spells her name with an "I"
waits naked on the couch for the cable guy
her TV's not in need of repair
but he can route his cable almost everywhere

it's a triple X kinda love
the kind you see on DVD
it's a triple X kinda love
your girlfriend's back and now she's on her knees
it's a triple X kinda love

Amber needed money to go to school
so she put out for applications and frat boys too
she found her niche on "the net"
on the web @ barelylegalandsoakingwet.com

it's a triple X kinda love
you're a mild mannered gent until you pop a tent
it's a triple X kinda love
leather and lace and a sticky face
it's a triple X kinda love

keeps you buying more at the latex store
it's a triple X kinda love
you can't get enough of those Malaysian whores
it's a triple X kinda love


Copyrighted 2000 CBJS

Yo ya'll....

I had to take a call from a man whos wife was murdered WITH her Cingular wireless phone.......she was strangled to death by the little thing that lets you hold it around your neck.......it was rough...........I still dont make 9.00 an hour after having to deal with shit like that.

I realized I havent invited Candice to my party...annnnnd....I dont think I want to...no...i dont think i do....

I bought Al Franken's book Lies and the Lying Liars who tell them....It seems great....

I think I am trying too hard...or no where near hard enough...

My sister has to have surgery for skin cancer in August.,.....sucks..but ..alas, It can be removed...so...

Charlie and the Chocolate Factory comes out this Friday....it is going to be the biggest horror of a remake in the history of Film...

Speaking of remakes -- The Posideon Adventure is being remade now. For those of you unfamiliar, In 1972 a movie was made called The Posideon Adventure in which an ocean liner on its last voyage is hit by a tidal wave on New Years eve right after midnight and is capsized and a group of 10 people survive the initial flip and have to fight for life...The original had a lot of Oscar winners in it an all......Lots of special effects...it should thoughougly kick ass.

I want to kill my mothers dog........random.

The Keg for the party---its go for launch...woo hoo...

Chris.

I am on Myspace.com now...I am listed of course as Chris, but my username is His Royal Highness. I have pictures posted which you may or may not like to see....Just so you know.

So, I have decided that since I know there is no way to stop the Crunk from showing up at my party, I am going to list a certain area on the side of the house, outside of course, to allow the crankage to continue..That way if there is a police issue, it would be on the back of the house, and people could get rid of their shit. I would rather it not be there at all, but its better to be practical and prepared instead of naieve and stuck. 

I have 1053 feet of streamers...I plan to buy more....

"I can lick my OWN balls thank you!" -Derek Zoolander (Ben Stiller in "Zoolander")


I need to get a steady lady..im tired of bouncing around...its not as much fun as it used to be.....

I am tired, I had intended on writing more, however, tiredness has set in....the sun has set..and it is time to retire..

Look out for the walnuts,
Chris

A second entry...wow...who knew....

So, had a good weekend. Got to work saturday and decided, Fuck this, And I walked out. I decided I deserved a day off... So, I went and bought a bunch of stuff for my party..decorations etc, and some clothes because...i wanted to.....Then I went home...painted ...got some of that parental-bonding stuff out of the way for the week. It was nice,
Got cleaned up, headed out for a night on the town....that town being....Clarksville. 

Went to the blackhorse with Adam, katie, chad, Heather, some dude she knew and some chick she knew, Brooke, Dave, and Tony...It was a good night. While we were in the blachorse there was a big ruckus however, as ty pennington and all his extreme makeover people went walking by as they were leaving. Eh..ive met my share of celebrities in my time..however, I really dont think those guys are that big of a deal...

ANYWAYS,

     I think i may have drank a little much, as i had to crash at adam and tonys apartment last night as I have so many nights before. Wish I lived closer to town..would make drinking and getting home so much easier. I had so much barnstormer red ale and pizza...it was beautiful.... Anyways, we went to the Deli and back up to the tap room. Spent some time with John Winters, perhaps the only 30 year old musician who is actually any good in clarksville. He is probably the best in clarksville right now besdies for Ben Wilson. 

Anyways, when we were at the Deli, we went upstairs to the keg party....I saw so many M. Central people..it was wierd...and too loud and within the hour we were back at the Tap Room. 

So, Good night was had by all. 

Sending out the call again. Party - JULY 16TH...6.P.M. is when the bbq will hit the grill....the pool is cool..the limbo will be rockin........lots of good food, beer, booze, good friends and good times.....

Its wierd, this time last year, I hated both beer and wine. Now, I have at least 1 beer every other day and I have a bottle of Pino in the crisper now....Oddities 

Have to go back about the passport tomorrow afternoon. I dont see why they make getting a passport so hard....


watching Silence of the Lambs.....that was one fucked up movie..."I ate his liver with some fava beans and a nice Khianti. " .............eww......


I am checkin out. of course, I can check out any time I like...but I can NEVER leave....


Chris

HEY KIDS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Well, I am taking a hiatus from my hiatus of not updating my livejournal. I decided, what the hell, give it a go, so...well...here goes.


I just realized that at this moment last year, i was on the beach...son of a bitch,.

ANYWAYS,

Got our pool back...party july 30th...yall come on over...

Friends are good, work sucks, and i think i should have an ice cream sandwich

Earl works with me now...oddities,

Brittany says my dong will fall off if i have sex with a certain person...I choose to live dangerously,...OF COURSE, the groom in Kill Bill said he liked to live dangerously and then 4 mo-fo's came and blew the entire wedding party away....hmm

I like to live dangerously *ducks

Um...now that I am writing, its hard to think of whats new...

Going to England this winter...two weeks..should be fun...what am i sayingk, its gonna be a blast.....rich,..

I am listening to Meatloaf - Anything for Love,,,what a masterfully overdone song.

I purchased a record...a record, what is it you may ask??? "Heartbeat" by Don Johnson...

Isnt that cool?????

I have contacts now....Got them from Dr Routledge....His staff is wonderful...especially his perky receptionist....anyone out there know her????Britt I belive you said you did....just barely,,,right???

Well..I am gonna getoffa here and go back to the exciting world of downloading music illegally off of the internet


Fare thee well

ao...........im in the library..in the middle of one of those library classes where we are supposed to learn to use the library as a search engine...im a junior...i know how to do research.......but..alas.....who cares....talking to gillie ...whilst i use the library for the wrong reasons...and i enjoy it.....So..i thought in this moment of boredom i would catch yall up on whats been going on......

I turned 21..!!!!!!!! December 17......WOO HOO...I had a 4 day celebration...spent it with adam, katie, kathryn, donnie, brooke, daniel, janie, asa, laura, chris, matt, matt and clarence......spent my b.day night at the blackhorse and the tap room..adam and katie got me  a Mug Club Membership......what wonderful friends...I had 14 drinks in the course of 4 hours........i was proud of myself....
The next night a bunch of us went to the Opryland Hotel to look at the Ice Display and the christmas lights....we got into the string tree that they have that goes like 10 stories high..looking up at it was a trip............Then went to TGIFridays...and they sang to me of course....then we went to this club...Johnnny Jacksons.........it was a blast..best club ever...

The next day we had the big fomal christmas ddinner party at Janies...it was nice..very nice...drank lots of wine..ate great food.....

Christmas was good.....lots of snow and ice........

Went on a few good dates...i like this new girl im talking to ..Tara...she seems cool....might like to get to know her more.....

Im back in theatre.....Im doing two shows..one of which is David Ives "The Universal Language"..its mostly gibberish..extremely hard.........i dont know how im gonna do it...I am thrilled to be acting again....i feel complete....
___________________________________________________________________________________
A little girl was talking to her teacher about whales. The teacher 
said it was physically impossible for a whale to swallow a human 
because even though it was a very large mammal its throat was very 
small. The little girl stated that Jonah was swallowed by a whale. 

Irritated, the teacher reiterated that a whale could not swallow a 
human; it was physically impossible. 

The little girl said, "When I get to heaven I will ask Jonah ." 

The teacher asked, " What if Jonah went to hell?" 

The little girl replied, "Then you ask him"

*****************************************************************

Being smarmy to a teacher = priceless. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
well....class is about to end so i gotta wrap this up and all.........Guess i need to shove off.....

Thanks for reading...


Stay Classy

Chris.

Opon this, the twenty minutes before U.S. History, i ponder in the computer lab b/c its pouring outside and i cant go to lunch b/c my umbrella is in my car.......why should i ever update in this thing...then it hits me......because i can.......so..here i am


I voted for the first time ever this past friday...and being a flag waving-bumper sticker having-multi buttons on the backpack wearing democrat....i did of course vote for kerry....which we all know is a douche...but better a douche than a used tampon like Bush...All in accordance say Aye! all opposed.....well....your suffering enough......
Voting was cool....i dontk now why it kinda got me off....it was odd as well in the fact that the person who had to show me how to use the booth was none other than my evil fifth grade teacher Mrs. Wilson....my mom had mrs wilson when she was in fifth grade and my mother will be 50 next year so that shows how old this woman is.....hella old..............

I didnt go all democrat b/c if yopu go all one party and none on the other, not only are you just blind...you have no opinion other than you are for one belief or the other...i find its better to take in on a candidate by candidate approach..as opposed to being all balls-to-to-the-walls one sided......


Alas i must go to class....hey a rhyme.......You all have fun and give me a yell..believe it or not..there are some things still happening in clarksville....yall have fun and remeber my Hanukah presents........

1. My favorite color is blue.
2. I am a god damned democrat
3. My favrite singers are Reba Mc Entire and DMB
4. I am going into the Peace Corp
5. I plan on living in South Carolina
6. I've had surgery before.
7. I enjoy smoking......ciggarettes 
8. I enjoy Mariachi bands and also tight elastic pants
9. I wear a size 36
10. Michael Douglas is my fave actor
11. I think CHEESE IS GOOD
12. I cannot stand republicans who have no ability to see a view besides their own
13. Cherry Coke is awesome.....
14. I have a double major
15. I have gotten drunk wearing a red silk Elvis costume before.

I also constructed a list of things i wish to do over the course of the next semester. .....here goes...try to keep the laughter to a slight half-hearted sinister chuckle....that was way too many adjectives.....


Within the semester....
- stop blowing money
- have a 3.4.GPA..at least
-Have a rockin 21st Birthday Bash
-have lots of wild copious sex
-loose 50 pounds
-have a meaningful woman who doesnet go psycho
-pick a major...and keep it more than a semester.
-move out..yeah right.....
-burn convergys to the ground and dance on the ashes naked with 1000 of my closest friends......
-also keep a well stocked bar...thats a good suggestion on Emily's part.....
-actually study...and maybe have a highball to end the night..
-stop bitching about stupid shit like i do incessantly til lit drives everyone to drink
-aquire all chicago albums
-buy new winshield wiper blades
-do theatre....of some type
-have sex for money..........just checking to see if your still reading.
-actually study before its necessary...
- pay off my car and become a professional student. 
-have earl dye his hair blonde and buy an american eagle wardrobe.
- CELEBRATE OUR NEW DICTATOR OF AMERICA BILL CLINTON (hey..it could happen..... if we just band together...cmon people now..smile on your brother..every body get together....) 
-learn swahili........nah......just whatever Starvin Marvin on South Park speaks.....
-GET THROUGH ANOTHER YEAR.....


Most of my objectives are hollow..but then again...     we are all young...19+ youths in America...were not supposed to be goal oriented...after all we are dumb fat americans..........but..its good to be positive..yall have fun....


C

I went to the Chicago Earth wind and fire concert Last night...it was groovy....it was a 4 hour show......it rocked ass.....E.W.F. Put on a much better show than i anticipated...Chicago did not have the performance i expected..only one power ballad...and that was a little dissapointing..everything else..but too many damn solos........you know how there is like an hour of song and 3 hours of solo..that was the concert.

afterwards we all (me, adam, katie and donny) went and saw Harold and Kumar go to White Castle at Green Hills...that movie...is directly descended from the lord...........i belive that.......


I am talking to gil now so im gonna get offa here....yall keep rocking


C

SO, CAME BACK FROM THE BEACH LAST WEEK.....that was nice...we went to Myrtle Beach..it was alot of fun..makes tennessee look like shit..but then again..what doesnt.....sorry to anyone that may have called me and i didnt answer or return the call...but on vacation i try to not answer my phone...whats the point.....


i get to go and give APSU a big nasty check this week.......damn them...............

earl....we still havent gotten together and gotten schnockered.....we need to fix that.....I understand how you feel about the whole construction thinbg....my schedule was a not quite as long days but still..i know...but honestly..i liked it alot more than convergys....advantages however are the fact that after work in order to go somewhere you had to go home and spend an hour trying to turn yourself back into a normal looking person.....and contruction dust takes a few days to get out...........maybe i remeber wrong..maybe it just sucked...........

i got a new camera....i love it..........its a dig. canon........3.2 m.pixels...it can take video too....mom got it for me for the trip...its super.....cant wait to start taking the impromptu photos..............


Wel..im gonna get offa here and go wash my car....even though i really dont wanna......     im desperate to get rid of it.......its a great car...i just really dont like it .............later yall..have fun.................

Well, Thought I had updated again a week ago, as i see now, that never went rhrough...SOOOOO here goes again. 

LAST WEEK, I went to this party on Greenwood at this dude named Myrons house. Everyone was pretty much there...It was a crazy night. HOWEVER, i had already been to Jazz on the Lawn for the last 3 hours and had drunk a bottle of Riesling and  A bottle of Golden Rose so I was already kickin it. Then Tony, Adams roomate, gave me some hooch he had made which was comprised of Hawaiian punch and Everclear. However, I did not know what was in it....it was good...soo good that i kept drinking till i drank nearly a gallon...For a few hours..I was on top of the world and ended up making out with this chick named theresa who was actually named heather but she eventually got into my drunkeness....By the end of the night however, I was in the parking lot back at adams apartment throwing my guts up...the only time I have ever been sick from being drunk....


BY THE WAY, THE HOOCH WILL BE AT MY PARTY THIS COMING SATURDAY - JULY 16TH.....


SO, this saturday, I went to another party...also on Greenwood. Who would have known but also, everyone else, again was there, but this time the dude from Survivor - Ryan - was there...and also later on Viva La Bam..thats right, apparently he had been in nashville shooting some stuff for a future show and was getting mobbed everywhere he went so he knew a guy in clarksville who happeend to be at the party so he came on down .....it was an oddity but really, not a big deal and no one hassled him or gave him issues, and there were like 150 people there....good times by all...

the hot chick from the week before, theresa, well, i found out this week that she has a boyfriend...who goes to west point...and talking to her sober was extremely hard to do cause she doenst have the sense God gave a goose. .....but ashley was there...and i think i want to pursue that.....


SO.....Even though they bombed the hell out of london last week...I am still going ..I dont care.....FUCK THE TERRORISTS AND PASS ME SOME AIRLINE PEANUTS!!!!!!AND A SPOT OF TEA WITH A CRUMPET!!!!!!

And in accordance, My party..again..this coming saturday...will be a great time...You all really need to get down there...Twill be loads of fun and also there will be prizes for the ladies in both the limbo and also the mud wrestling contests ---Southern Secrets Gift Certificates....i think you all could use them.......

Im out of here...you all have a fine evening and a pleasant tomorrow. 

Chris

PARTY AT MY HOUSE - - - - JULY 16TH......NEXT SATURDAY....BE THERE OR BE SQUARE...CONTACT ME FOR MORE INFO...


In other news, It sucks about england....What is odder however, is that yesterday, I actually filled out my applications at APSU to go to London this winter.....I would have gotten on  a plane this afternoon and gone too...My friend Bryan who goes to belmont actually did leave for london today. They dont care..what can we do..we cant fight the Jihaad...so might as well have a good time....


whats july 16????? the answer...my goddamned party...be there......


later yall

c

So..today was fair enough. i was up at 5 to go to work..i worked 4 hours this morning and was off by 11:00........

SO, i went tothe mal cause i needed some leather sandals.....and i got everything but... talked to emily for a while in Parks Belk..........she seems happy....herparents seem like real dicks though.......frm the things she said... they treat her like shit. But i digress.......

Leave it to Robin Williams to come up with the
perfect plan. What we need now is for our UN
Ambassador to stand up and repeat this message.
Robin Williams' plan...(Hard to argue with this
logic!)

I see a lot of people yelling for peace, but I have
not heard of a plan for peace. So, here's my plan:

The US will apologize to the world for our
"interference" in the affairs of other countries,
past &present. You know, Hitler, Mussolini, Tojo,
Noriega, Milosovich and the rest of those 'good ole
boys.' We will never "interfere" again.

We will withdraw our troops from all over the world,
starting with Germany, South Korea and the
Philippines. They don't want us there anyway. We
would station troops at our borders and allow no one
to sneak through holes in the fence.

We will allow all illegal aliens 90 days to get
their affairs together and leave this country and
will give them a free trip home. After 90 days the
remainder will be gathered up and deported
immediately, regardless of who or where they are.
I'm sure France would welcome them.

All future visitors will be thoroughly checked and
limited to 90 days, unless given a special permit.
No one from a terrorist nation would be allowed in.
If you don't like it there, change it yourself and
don't hide here. Asylum would never be available to
anyone. We don't need any more cab drivers or 7-11
cashiers.

No "students" over age 21. The older ones are the
bombers. If they don't attend classes, they get a
"D" and it's back home, baby.

Energy wise, the US will make a strong effort to
become self-sufficient. This will include developing
non-polluting sources of energy but will require a
temporary drilling of oil in the Alaskan wilderness.
The caribou will have to cope for a while.

Offer Saudi Arabia and other oil producing countries
$10 a barrel for their oil. If they don't like it,
we go some place else. They can go somewhere else to
sell their production. (About a week of the wells
filling up the storage sites would be enough.)

If there is a famine or other natural catastrophe in
the world, we will not "interfere." They can pray to
Allah or whomever, for seeds, rain, cement, or
whatever they need. Besides, most of what we give
them is stolen or given to the army. The people who
need it most get little or nothing.

Ship the UN Headquarters to an isolated island some
place. We don't need the spies and fair weather
friends here. Besides, the building would make a
good homeless shelter or lockup for illegal aliens.

All Americans must go to charm and beauty school.
That way, no one can call us "Ugly Americans" any
longer.

The Language we speak is ENGLISH.....learn it...or LEAVE...

Now, ain't that a winner of a plan.

"The Statue of Liberty is no longer saying 'Give me
your poor, your tired, your huddled masses." She's
got a baseball bat and she's yelling, 'You want a
piece of me?'" -

My costume - Elvis- was the hit of course..it was wonderful...with my gold silk scarves and sequins and all...it was great.......I went to class and work still but left work early, our boy Ty at work who takes care of scheduling errors dressed as "Connie Lingus"  ...... really goth type chick with breasts and all...he won our costume contest. my costime was great...hard to sit in....VERY HARD TO GO TO THE BATHROOM IN...i had to take the whole thing off if i did for there were no openings in it....So around 3 in the morning...it had to go.....

I got extremely....drunk...or so i was told....No, i remember alot ...some....of it...I tell yall..im a sight to see....Some drunks are mean drunks, Some are emotional....Im a fun drunk..everythings a party and ive got the lampshade on my head.....Only downside is im very loud.  It wasa a rocking good time....lots of people...and i liked most of em...One dude from high school...he left early to go steal a car...no one knows why he was there or who he came with..but he left to go steal a car..Rick Royal...if you remember him...he was one of the "extras"  some of yall know what im talking about....and someone else bought all the smirnoff and skyy and c. royal and parrot bay and it was a rocking good time..Fun was had by all...

And i went to work the next day...jsut fine....i never have a hangover...
People were throwing up within an hour...i was beside them yelling....
"Can i get you another drink?>??!?!?!?!?!?!"...

They said no...

I dropped bio...fuck it...i wanna keep a good gpa..ill just take astronomy with candice next semester...

Journalism is the major...tv of magazime i dont know.....

speaking of candice...WHO WAS SUPPOSED TO GO TO THAT PARTY AND DIDNT......She works at convergys now...she will start the 15th....i will have been there a year on the 8th of this month.......Lord....I have been there a year...and tomorrow i will start my 14th transition class....im so good :) hey..i get a raise this month too..bitchin

-"I guess the world didnt stop...for my broken heart"

Um...Oh...well...on the homefront...there is major news....

My mother....has...well.....finally over the past 3 months snagged a good fella....he has a new blazer and cash so of course im content but he is very casual and nice...very shy..and not fake...so...i guess as long as she is happy i am too......they are still talking about..within a year...if they decide to build a house on the land somewhere farther back, mama plans to give me...GIVE me the house...So, im gonnna start lookin for roomates now..cause if i find some, then i can live bill free and dont have to work and can live off my friends...woo hoo....

What a year this has been...near death 3 times.....new job.....lots of promotions....John Ritter died, I got a sweet car, and my mother has finally been tamed....who knew.......

i think 2004 is gonna be the year everything comes together...it has a nice ring to it...2004...i like even numbers.....except in family portraits...looks too balanced.

my mom got a new tv for her room..and she gave me her 32...wowie.....im in giant tv heaven..i love how big tvs have gotten..its so...american....hehehe

megan is IMing me......and i dont like it..she has been trying to call me fgor a week and im ignoring it...i mean..i like megan..i do...but damn the way she did me this summer..im not gonna let it happen again....im a big boy now and i dont have time for that stuff.


A good shag can only be accountable for so much........

are you alive earl..havent heard from ytou inawhile....

well....im gonna get offa here.......I think its time to go..yeah...but before i do..the most inspirational lyrics of the day......

So saturday night i went bowling @ the Pinnacle with patrick and sarah and one of her friends and keith and kendra......and well...it was diffrent..my first set i got like a 130..the next i didnt brreak 90........we were drinking smirnoff from the bar and they werent carding us.....we did like...3 games and left....I LOST NO MONEY..THATS NEVER HAPPENED BEFORE..Some of yall remember those many times.

We decided that since it was halloween, it was time to get scared...well it was already like nearly midnight so it was too late to go to nashville or anything...so we decided to go to the statues and then to ghost bridge......
Everyone knows about the statues and they frankly dont creep me out too much..a little but not too much....But ghost bridge i had only heard about....and id did suffice to creep me out...

So ok..we took off out of the pinnacle and it is like 10 minbutes off of Tiny Town rd......well......2 hours later when we see the signs showing we are in Trenton...we kinda got the idea...wait..were not in tennessee anymore....and we werenet...we stopped at a gasstation to revel in the pure spirit of Kentucky and ....to take a leak...I bought a keychain I (HEART) KENTUCKY......hence the subject line.....

We then went to ghost brdge the correct way...
Ok..so heres the lowdown....
Ghost bridge, at one time...was where they used to hold KKK rallys and such and they used to hang lots of people off of it when they had their lynchings....mainly cause it used to have higher water and if they didnt choke or break their necks in the noose they would drown...
The legend is....is that if you park your car at the end of the bridge and go into neutral with your lights off...your car will be pusded back...OVER a steep hill in the middle of the bridge and then to the other side...and then your car will stop automatically at the bridge end.....They say if you put baby powder or something like it on the front of your car you can see the handprints of your car being pusded.......

We ddnt have any powder...but we did have a car and since we werenyt in mine and i wasnt driving i was fine...So..we got to the end...skeptic me...Nothing will happen even though i admitted i was spooked...we sat there for a minute...another minute ...another minute...all of a sudden..a groan from underneath...and our starts moving about 5 or so mph....back over the bridge.. OVER the big hill in the middle and down the other side...then...stopped a\t the end........

at that time i managed to shit myself and we came back to patricks house....

H was showing us his inventions and such..he is about ot graduate from ITT in december and he has lots of those techie gadgets...like the air ram he built and the little camera robot thingie...very neat.

Fnalyl around 4 i managed to get home...and i had a day today but im too tired to mention it....I will later if i care too...well..night yall....dont get spooked......
